channel.title: ChromeFlair
channel.description:
Welcome to the topic: ChromeFlair
This new server is in development.
I am starting on [PI] because that is the easiest to code (for me) Base: Project Insanity Cleaned Developers: Koua.
Things Added:
Newer graphics Dragon claws and special Armadyl godsword and special Torva, Pernix, and some other mage armor added Vesta, Statius, Morrigan, and Zuriel added Full primal and other primal gear look alike armor All chaotics
Want To Add:
Insidiax's Dungeoneering Some custom items: Black Phat Yellow H'ween Mask Torva Hp Bonus Rocktail Hp Bonus Guthan armor Effect Rocktail Fishing Drygores Off hand and On Hand Owner Cape, Admin Cape, and Moderator Cape and more
lol idk what else to add :P
